name: The Magic Of Gathering
description:
IMPORTANT: saldy the leaderboard does not work in the web version so please download the game if you want to access it.

Get ready for a fast paced adventure where you run around a randomly generated island and blast demons away with your staff. 

combine different crystals and staffs to change up your playstyle.

Best Played Fullscreen.

Controls:

  •  wasd movement.
  • left click to shoot.
  • e to pickup items while looking at them.
  • 1 to remove crystal.
  • 2 to remove grip.
